page.title: 16Entertainment.
page.content: In Chirton,there is a dancing school called the Hamill-Mitchell School of Dancing.It was founded in 1945 by Alf and Rose Hamill.Today the Principal of the school is Veronica Hamill with help from her daughter Deborah Mitchell. Pupils are accepted from the age of 3 and are trained to a high standard.Subjects taught include Tap, Ballet,Ballroom,and Latin American. The lessons are on everyday.Piano lessons for adults are given by Alf Hamill.Childrens lessons start at 4p.m. and finish at 9.p.m.A lesson lasts up 1\ hours.On a Saturday lessons beging at 9.15a.m. and go through to the afternoon.Private lesson's are given by Deborah Mitchell At certain times of the year the dancers come together to perform a Stage show or pantomine. by Claire Taylor.
